subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer were knocked out in the semifinals of the Madrid Masters. Nadal was beaten by Gilles Simon, who rallied for a 3-6, 7-5, 7-6 (6) victory. Simon advanced to Sunday’s final against Andy Murray, who stopped Federer, 3-6, 6-3, 7-5, in a rematch of last month’s United States Open final. The results mean that Nadal will finish the year with the No. 1 ranking.
